page.title: 16ECOLOGY
page.content:
The valley sides in the{Cwmtillery {Valley}are of interest because of the {natural woodland}that has survived. These woodlands are of conservation interest for phytosociological and habitat diversity reasons. Much of the area is made up of rough grazing and the open nature of the mountain tops is important for public access.
There is little pollution outside the urban area and what there is is associated with the Roseheyworth Colliery and the River Ebbw Fach.
The other important ecological feature is the reclaimation of old coal tips;many of these have been seeded and landscaped.
